sourcesContent:
Identifiez-vous pour accèder à votre espace

Vous avez pas un compte ? Créer le
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user'; import { ProductService } from '../product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { username: string = ''; password: string = ''; error: string = ''; constructor(private productService: ProductService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.loginTo(this.username, this.password); } loginTo(username: string, password: string): void { this.productService.loginTo(username, password) .subscribe(user => this.user = user); } }
